article.title: General Atomics Supports MQ-9 Reaper
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: General Atomics Aeronautical Systems (GA-ASI) of San Diego, California, is being awarded a $120,551,310 firm fixed price contract to provide MQ-9 Reaper spares and ground support equipment. The contracting activity is Aeronautical Systems Center, Medium Altitude Unmanned Aircraft Systems, Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio.
